answers.answer: U wont, just don't eat anything 12 hrs before ur 3 hr test. I had the 1 hr test positive too, and the 3 hr came out negative.
Thank u..u did u fast in ur one hr test?bcoz I did.
Yeah i did and still came out positive.
I cut back on carbs for 2 days before my 3 hour and was just careful how much sugar I had and I passed ! Good luck

I was borderline with the 1 hour so they made me do the 3- I fasted for 12 hours and all results came back just fine so i wouldn't worry. Even if it doesn't- try not to stress out there's a ton of info on the web to help you make sense of it and switch things in your diet which can help
I had to do the 3hr they told me to only fast for 8 hrs.. so they said have a half a sandwich before 12. I go to sleep at 10 so I ate a banana and peanut butter before 10.. I passed the 3hr one
I did past my one hour or 3 hour. I have been diagnosed with gestational diabetes not my first time having it so I'm ready for the challenge. It *****
